message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This ensures we both get a good share. What do you say?
Your offer was a bit one-sided. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation.
Let's split it evenly this time.  Inflation is hitting us both, so a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
